thread.section_title: Caravel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel - Review of Caravel Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: 195claire
title: Fantastic Hotel
text: Shared a twin room with my mum, was immaculate and inviting. Reception were really helpful booking trips and taxis. Restaurant was great, breakfast was fresh and there was food to suit all tastes. We stayed on a half board basis and could not fault the choice! The starters were huge, almost a meal in itself. The hotel is a little out of the centre, but for 10 euros you could get a taxi into the city. If I visit Rome again will definitely return to this hotel. Highly recommended.
